name: Estado Digital
description:
EstadoDigital was first founded by Eric Tulle and Eugenia Soma in 2001; it specialized in web design and motion graphics.
In 2004, Leonardo Custer joined the team to direct the area of administration and human resources, during that year the first web portals were designed for Banco Santa Cruz and Solar Shopping. Due to high volume of demand, the studio grew and moved to the neighborhood of Palermo, in Capital Federal.
